about_the_game:
Purchase Season 4 of the Premium Drive Pass to unlock the ability to earn a total of 84 Premium Rewards, including: 9 Vehicles, 25 Brick Packs, 10 Drivers, 6 Flairs, 8 Sounds, 26 Stickers, and more! The Premium Drive Pass Season 4 is also included in the Year 1 Drive Pass*.

If you have been playing through the Free version of a Season and decide to upgrade to the Premium version of Drive Pass Season 4, you will instantly unlock all the Premium rewards you have earned based on your current level!

LEGO 2K Drive Seasons are not time limited, so you can pick up and play each Season at your own pace!

*Drive Pass rewards require unlocking with gameplay. Premium Rewards are only available as part of the paid Premium Drive Pass Season 4, which is available for individual purchase and included in the Year 1 Drive Pass. The Year 1 Drive Pass is included in the Awesome Edition and Awesome Rivals Edition and is available for individual purchase. Base Game, Internet Connection and 2K Account required.
